data.client_settings: Firefox 61.0.1 (64-bit) Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 20360, Version Hash: 20767413063d4ed6fbcf9d26f703ac3c61dcc897 and Chrome 68.0.3440.84 (64-bit) Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 20362, Version Hash: 20767413063d4ed6fbcf9d26f703ac3c61dcc897
data.actual_result: The cursor stays the same and doesn't change
data.expected_result: The cursor should change to the highlight cursor
data.short_description: [Firefox/Chrome] When you move the cursor to the "0 ONLINE" of online friends on the top-left, the cursor doesn't change
data.steps_to_repro: - Open discord on Firefox or Chrome - Move your cursor to the top-left where it says how many friends are online (0 ONLINE or so) - Observe
